item.title: Arch linux AUR Build Package Notes
item.description: Arch linux AUR build package Build Aur packages Make sure base build packages are installed before trying to make aur packages for the first time. pacman -Syu pacman -Sy base-devel Clone repo from AUR Get repo address from arch website AUR https://aur.archlinux.org/ git clone https://aur.archlinux.org/packagename.git cd packagename makepkg -s
